channel.title: Name Case Sensitive and Allowing Characters - Read for more info
channel.description:
My base is a project insanity and I would like to allow players to use the _ and - characters in their name as well as case sensitive names like Battlescape used to be (or still is I'm not sure).
I'm not requesting spoonfeeding but I at least need to be told where to look to allow this.

item.title: Name Case Sensitive and Allowing Characters - Read for more info

@Kodiak wrote:

My base is a project insanity and I would like to allow players to use the _ and - characters in their name as well as case sensitive names like Battlescape used to be (or still is I’m not sure).

I’m not requesting spoonfeeding but I at least need to be told where to look to allow this.

Read full topic
